content: Namely: Size, no other gold mine has started production with 30 million ounces in measured and indicated resources; Scale, expected to be 1 million ounce a year producer with a projected life of at least 27 years; We'll have low production costs due to the high grade for a large scale open pit at 2.25 grams, nearly twice the industry average; Growth, exploration potential are planned beyond the 27 years of production; And being in Alaska, one of the great mining jurisdictions in the world and on private land designated for mining.
